sentence.Network_en: These symptoms may be referable to virus infection rather than parasites.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些症状也许是由病毒感染引起的，而与寄生虫无关。

sentence.Network_en: This disease is referable to microbes.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个病是由细菌引起的.

sentence.Network_en: Something of the awfulness , even of Death itself, is referable to this.
sentence.Network_cn: 从此我们可以领悟到一些令人肃然竦然的东西, 甚至死亡本身.

2013年6月13日 -  refer/ ri’f?:/ vt.使求助于 vi.谈到 reference/ ‘ref?r?ns/ n.参考;出处;提及 refine/ ri’fain/ vt.&vi.精炼,提纯 reflect/ ri’.

means.word_mean: 1. (usually followed by `to') able to be assigned or credited to;

sentences.sentence: "the cancellation of the concert was due to the rain"
"the oversight was not imputable to him"
"decide to which of these motives such extraordinary scenes are referable"- Charles Dickens
